text_input.description: Tokenized review text from ReviewText column

numerical_input.description: Numerical features in order: ReviewCount, UserCountry_encoded, text_length, word_count, avg_word_length, exclamation_count, question_count, upper_case_ratio, title_text_length, title_word_count, title_avg_word_length, title_exclamation_count, title_question_count, title_upper_case_ratio

output_details.description: Probability scores for each rating level (1-5 stars)
